sources.name: Kenya National Bureau of Statistics (KNBS)
sources.description: Official government agency responsible for collecting, analyzing and disseminating statistical data in Kenya.

sources.name: The National Treasury and Planning
sources.description: Government ministry responsible for national budget, economic policy, and financial management.

sources.name: Controller of Budget (CoB)
sources.description: Independent office that oversees implementation of budgets of national and county governments.

sources.name: Commission on Revenue Allocation (CRA)
sources.description: Recommends the basis for equitable sharing of revenue between national and county governments.

sources.name: Central Bank of Kenya
sources.description: Kenya's central bank responsible for monetary policy and financial stability.

dataVerificationProcess: All data has been cross-referenced with multiple official sources and verified for accuracy. Data is updated quarterly or as new official information becomes available.
